lines.text: [repeated line]
Join me in Death!
[repeated line]
Be my victim!
Take my shield for one little fuck up?
[bounds his locker door]
ONE LITTLE FUCK UP
[storms off Jamal Matthews listens close by shaking his head]
Well I'll show them, I'll show those fucks
Go on Jamal... Why don't you go shoot some hoops?
What did you say?
Jeeze get yourself a sense of humor
I'm sure you'll find some way to bust my balls
Now you know why we're not too friendly with the local cops?
Get his bigoted ass outta here
You know we gave Miguel a hard time... but underneath it all we liked him!
Underneath it all... we liked him? What's that crock of shit?
She's a material witness.
She's a piece of ass is what she is... next you'll be showing up at her door with a dozen roses.
[His last lines]
Look at you... you disgust me! Making nice to the wetback?... After you cut him up?

[protesting]
You don't understand
Oh I understand... I understand you're a twisted little bitch

[holding up a hook]
I'm gonna split you open from groin to gullet
Don't do this... it was the candyman

[looking at the hook]
I'm the candyman!

[takes a swing at her only to be shoot by Jamal in the back/back of head]
Miss McKeever? Miss McKeever? Are you okay?

[dying line as Jamal kicks away the hook]
Ca... ndy... Man...
